title: The Fruit of the Spirit: Peace
description:
Readings from:

Numbers 6:24-26

Psalm 119:165

Isaiah 26:3-4

John 14:27

Philippians 4:6-7

Colossians 3:15

Today's passages were read by Katie Gerber, a project manager for a creative agency. She lives in Illinois.
